attributes.action: Hold a National day of rememberance and celebration.
attributes.additional_details: It would show the Government to be passionate and caring about the people of the UK.
attributes.background: In light of the news of a vaccine that could see the end of the pandemic, I would like the Government to consider a National day of rememberance and celebration to acknowledge those whom have lost loved ones, those whom we owe a gratitude for keeping the country going through these difficult times.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

To create a Remembrance Day for healthcare workers who died from COVID-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562558

Bank Holiday to recognise unity during Covid Pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561277
